Sentencas: The substantial use of fossil fuels in marine transportation aggravates the problems of energy shortage and environmental pollution.
Titulo: An integrated solution to harvest the waste heat from a large marine solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The application of fuel cell and waste heat recovery technology in ships can effectively address this severe global issue.
Titulo: An integrated solution to harvest the waste heat from a large marine solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this study, a novel combined system comprising a solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine subsystem, supercritical-carbon dioxide recompression cycle, and Kalina cycle is introduced and analyzed.
Titulo: An integrated solution to harvest the waste heat from a large marine solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: First, the feasibility of each model is verified by comparing the subsystems with results in the literature.
Titulo: An integrated solution to harvest the waste heat from a large marine solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Subsequently, zeotropic working fluids are used in the supercritical-carbon dioxide recompression cycle.
Titulo: An integrated solution to harvest the waste heat from a large marine solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Then, the optimum composition and ratio of working fluids in the bottoming cycles are determined by simulation.
Titulo: An integrated solution to harvest the waste heat from a large marine solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Finally, the thermodynamic and economic properties are simulated and analyzed.
Titulo: An integrated solution to harvest the waste heat from a large marine solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results illustrate that the actual power output and thermal efficiency of this combined system can reach 286.41 kW and 71.37%, respectively.
Titulo: An integrated solution to harvest the waste heat from a large marine solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The latter is 38.65% higher than the efficiency of a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: An integrated solution to harvest the waste heat from a large marine solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In addition, the maximum cost recovery time of the waste heat recovery system is 7.492 year, which completely satisfies the economic requirements.
Titulo: An integrated solution to harvest the waste heat from a large marine solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: To summarize, the proposed novel system design exhibits characteristics of high efficiency and cleanliness and is a better option for marine power generation equipment.
Titulo: An integrated solution to harvest the waste heat from a large marine solid oxide fuel cell
